mapper.insert: insert into user_card (user_id, card_id,card_identifier,card_password, create_time, create_by,update_time,update_by ,usable) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{cardIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cardPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},NOW(),#{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},NOW(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{usable,jdbcType=BIT})
